successBanner.title: Success
successBanner.message: FOIA request task has been cancelled. If you have made a mistake, please email Inbound Ops Supervisor for any changes.

failBanner.title: Warning
failBanner.message: Error FOIA request task has not been cancelled

completeBanner.title: Complete
completeBanner.message: %s task has been marked complete. If you have made a mistake, please email %d for any changes

completeFailBanner.title: Complete
completeFailBanner.message: Task unable to be completed or assigned.%s %s
